title: Dove Advanced Care Sheer Moisture Leave-In Replenishing Mist, 9.25 FL. OZ. (273 mL)
description: Hair needs different levels of moisture depending on the level of symptoms experienced. Dove Sheer Moisture provides just the right level of care to hair with slight symptoms of dryness, without weighing it down.
